attributes.action: immediately implement a fully accountable, independent, public inquest into the deaths of Princess Diana and Dodi Al Fayed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Enough is enough. People are moving this case along to suite their own agendas and little has been done to learn from the errors that took place on so many levels. Let's bust open the honest truth of this sad event and lay to rest their memories once and for all.
